node.description: Long racks of robes and gowns line the walls, their wooden poles almost groaning under the weight of the merchandise. The quiet murmur of voices fills the air as customers debate their purchases.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Accessories
node.description: A long walnut counter displays accessories and other extras for purchase. A few bins and baskets on the floor provide extra display space for further items.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Jewelry
node.description: Glass cases and cabinets along the walls offer up jewelry and other adornments for perusal and purchase. Several armed guards stand in the corners, their gimlet eyes keeping the customers under watch to prevent theft.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Doublets and Shirts
node.description: Garments hang from the racks and stands around the room, their colorful fabrics and trims dazzling to the eye. Cheerful salespeople roam about, ready to answer questions or get a different item from the stockroom.

node.name: A Knight at the Club, Legwear
node.description: Piles of clothing are stacked up on shelves and counters, ready for purchase by customers. Smiling clerks answer questions and help the buyers with their other requirements.

node.name: The Future is Now, Armillary Sphere
node.note: the future is now|future is now
node.description: Contained within the gargantuan iron sphere that forms this chamber are dozens of massive brass rings connected to a globe via a thick central axis. Ceaselessly, the rings twirl and spin about in silent harmony, no two plotting the same course. Prominently featured upon each is a limelight which collectively casts a multihued kaleidoscope of illumination about the room. A particularly wide ring slowly plots a course that offers customers a relatively safe path between the entrance and exit of the shop proper.

node.name: The Future is Now, Workshop
node.description: The once spacious workshop is cramped by mechanical flights of fantasy. Many are little more than carefully annotated blueprints, scattered springs and stray gears, while others proudly proclaim their completion with scribbled price tags. Some merchandise lies in tangles and piles of clutter, while others sprawl across the workbench, a side table, the assorted shelving and even the walls.

node.name: Tick Tock, Sales Floor
node.description: From behind a counter, a clerk carefully cleans fingerprints and other smudges from the wares proudly displayed throughout the small room. A shadesatin-lined tray of fancy clockwork devices is set on a counter between a black bust and some alerce pegs showcasing similar mechanical creations. Metal keys matching the various gadgets hang from some aldamdin hooks.

node.name: A Cultured Attire, The Mountain Elves
node.description: A multitude of tapestries depicting majestic mountain ranges hang from the walls, representing a wide variety of styles. Willowy clerks glide from room to room, graceful despite the piles of clothing, weapons and armor that they carry.

node.name: Eluned's Dreams in Flesh
node.note: eluned's dreams in flesh|eluneds dreams in flesh
node.description: The mother-of-pearl walls are a pristine white, reflecting light in iridescent swirls. Cabinets are stocked with dyes of every imaginable color and shade. Comfortable looking benches and stools are spaced about the room. Small tables are setup in the corners of the shop.

node.name: Swish Slash and Stab, Salesroom
node.description: Sleek racks and neatly organized shelves showcase an array of stylish garments. Bright lighting accentuates the vibrant colors and intricate designs, allowing each piece to shine in its own right. Mirrors strategically placed around the space invite shoppers to envision themselves in the latest fashions.

node.name: Floors for Thought, Main Salesfloor
node.description: Metal racks with rollout shelves line the walls, each shelf displaying a different sample of floor covering for perusal. Windows high in the walls provide lighting during daylight hours, with hanging gaethzen globes available during evening hours.

node.name: Floors for Thought, Refined Tastes
node.description: In contrast to the main salesfloor, the racks in this room are crafted from the finest tropical hardwoods. The flooring in the room is plain ash planking, but of such a fine finish that it is like walking on satin. Leaded glass clerestory windows allow in clear sunlight to aid the patrons in their selections.

node.name: The Haunted House, Front Hall
node.description: Dark red candles burn in small braziers on either side of the arched doorway, the myriad of rugs spread across the floor awash with the eerie light. Several chests line the sides of the small room, watchful eyes painted above them on the completely black walls. Shadows run deep in every corner, relentlessly assaulting the imagination with images of childhood monsters.

node.name: The Haunted House, Study
node.description: Standing in a battle-ready position with both hands gripped on their swords, a row of empty plate armor lines the northern wall, which is hung with moth-eaten purple drapes. On the southern side of the room, a skeletal horse with a fleshless knight mounted on its back is poised toward the armor, making the only path to the wares pass directly in the line of fire of both sides. Thin floorboards have been painted a dull grey, doing little to hide the extensive wear and tear.

node.name: The Haunted House, Bedroom
node.description: Rather well lit with a single bright candle set in a grubby lantern, the room is laid out with several pieces of furniture, which are arranged neatly. Though antique at best, the pieces lining the room are masterfully carved. Each has a somewhat sinister air about it, the arrangement of chairs and headboards throwing sharp shadows on the walls in macabre patterns. Treacherous holes in the floor are precariously patched over with thin boards, offering little safety.

Very little light filters through boarded-up windows, covered in webs thick with the dried corpses of black widow spiders. Antique at best and sinister at worst, the furniture lining the room is neatly laid out, though much of it is difficult to make out in the dim light. Treacherous holes in the floor have been precariously patched over with thin boards, offering little safety.

node.name: The Haunted House, Kennel
node.description: Several cages are dimly visible in the poorly lit room, their doors tightly bolted. Shining eyes blink out from the darkness, some natural and some seeming otherworldly, glowing red and standing out in the darkness. A low brazier burns in the corner of the room, doing little to chase away the oppressive shadows.

node.name: The Haunted House, Attic
node.description: The cramped room resembles a large crawlspace underneath a peaked roof, with the sharply slanted ceiling intersecting the floor on the eastern side. A single candle is set on the sill of a frosted window, throwing the room into a myriad of light and shadow. Cobwebs clutter every corner of the small room and drape over dreary pieces of furniture.

The cramped room resembles a large crawlspace underneath a peaked roof, with the sharply slanted ceiling intersecting the floor on the eastern side. Muted light filters in through a frosted window, illuminating dust motes floating through the air. Cobwebs clutter every corner of the small room and drape over dreary pieces of furniture.

node.name: The Eclectic Eccentric
node.description: A silk roof rises overhead, and candles hung in paper globes beneath it cast merry shadows that seem to frolic along the gauze-draped walls. Mirrored counters crowded with wares and bins of edibles vie for space with various mannequins tucked about the shop.

node.name: Field Fashion, Not-Really-Skirts
node.description: Palm fronds cover the walls, providing partial cover from the elements. The raised floor is sanded teak planks which support a variety of racks and stands for the merchandise.

node.name: Field Fashion, Things That Are Still Not Skirts
node.description: Tucked into the back of the cabana is this airy room with large open screened windows. A few shelves and racks showcase the items for sale.

node.name: Field Fashion, Long Things That Might Trip You
node.description: Instead of palm frond walls, the room is enclosed with louvered panels that help to keep the elements out without impeding air flow. The merchandise is displayed on counters and tables.

node.name: Urn Back Time, Front Room
node.description: A framework of oak poles holds up the canvas sides, which are decorated with painted designs in red and black depicting people in flowing clothes marching in procession. A few lanterns hanging from the roofpoles provide lighting for the shop's wares displayed on the wooden shelves and racks about the area.

node.name: Urn Back Time, Back Room
node.description: A framework of oak poles holds up the canvas sides, which are decorated with painted designs in red and black depicting people in long robes parading through a city street. A few lanterns hanging from the roofpoles provide lighting for the shop's wares displayed on the wooden shelves and racks about the area.

node.name: The Eyes Have It, Salesfloor
node.note: the eyes have it|eyes have it
node.description: Stepping into the shop, there is an inviting ambiance with soft, pastel hues adorning the walls and plush, cream-colored carpet underfoot. Oil lanterns overhead create a warm and comforting glow, illuminating the tastefully arranged shelves and racks. A few sales clerks mingle with the shoppers, answering questions and straightening merchandise.

node.name: Only The Holy, Salesfloor
node.description: Frescos depicting the Immortals cover the wall, each depicted with their symbols and animals. The exposed roof beams have been carved into a running frieze of holy symbols, leaving no surface undecorated. In contrast to the roof beams, the racks and shelves displaying the merchandise are of plain wood.

node.name: Jynli's Cattery HE Wing, Main Room
node.note: jynli's cattery he wing|jynlis cattery he wing
node.description: Large spacious cages line the walls, each outfitted with a comfortable bed and a scratching post as well as full water and food bowls. Behind the mesh, each cage displays one of the exotic cats that Jynli is known for. The pets are mostly sleeping, but a few stare boldly out at the customers wandering around.

node.name: Pita Pan, Mainroom
node.description: Plain walls enclose a mostly bare room with just a counter for the salesclerks and a large table displaying the wares. A few lamps provide subdued lighting in line with the minimalist feel of the shop's fixtures.

node.name: All The King's Men, Entrance
node.note: all the king's men|all the kings men
node.description: Opulent tapestries ring the walls of the spacious vestibule, while thick plush rugs blanket the gleaming wooden floors. Low benches of polished deobar wood flank the entry flap. One lone table stands in the middle of the carpeted floor, a branching candelabra positioned carefully on a pristine white tablecloth.

node.name: All The King's Men, Hats
node.description: Plush pile carpets dyed in swirls of white and light purple cover the floor, hiding the waxed wood from view. Thin amethyst-colored silken curtains isolate the space from the remainder of the tent. Hats are piled in profusion on polished rowan wood tables and stands.

node.name: All The King's Men, Kilts
node.description: Aspen flooring, nearly hidden beneath the sumptuous pink plush carpets, covers the ground. The opulent merchandise available for purchase is showcased on aspen tables and racks. Delicate, airy fabric in shades of pink elegantly partitions this space from the expansive tent's surroundings.

node.name: All The King's Men, Pants
node.description: Opulent rugs of thick wool completely cover the ground, allowing patrons to browse in comfort. Folded pants are stacked on the aromatic cedarwood tables and counters. Wispy curtains of translucent emerald-green silk screen the area from the rest of the tent.

node.name: All The King's Men, Doublets
node.description: Fine-grained teak shelves and stands set out the luxurious offerings on sale. Wispy fabric drapes the shade of watermelon tourmaline help to section off this area from the rest of the commodious tent. Flooring of dark teak covers the floor, its surface almost totally concealed beneath the fuchsia-colored plush carpets.

node.name: All The King's Men, Cloaks
node.description: Intricately figured cocobolo wood racks and wardrobes display a profusion of brilliantly colored wares. Amber-colored sheer silken drapes delineate the section of the tent devoted to cloaks and other outerwear. Deep yellow wool pile carpets muffle all sounds of movement.

node.name: All The King's Men, Shoes
node.description: Burnished lunat wood stands and racks stand in the center of a midnight blue wool rug covering the matching plank floor. Shoes and boots in a myriad of styles grace the polished surfaces. Wispy draperies dyed a deep sapphire blue section the area off from the rest of the tent.

node.name: All The King's Men, Shirts
node.description: Silken gauze curtains dyed in jewel-tones partition the interior of the tent into smaller sections. Surrounding this section are delicate drapes in pale blue-greens the color of aquamarines. Gleaming white ash racks and tables hold brilliantly colored wares.

node.name: All The King's Men, Gloves
node.description: Pearlescent ivory-hued panels crafted from diaphanous silk hang from tent poles inlaid with narrow bands of mother-of-pearl. Woven wool rugs dyed a pale grey that is almost white cover the ground, providing a space for the icethorn shelves and tables displaying merchandise. Discreet salesclerks circulate among the customers to answer questions.

node.name: The Emperor's New Robes, Outlet
node.note: the emperor's new robes|the emporers new robes
node.description: Lofty tentpoles hold up the striped roof which soars overhead. Multi-hued bands of silk run vertically along the walls, making the interior a riot of color even without the kaleidoscopic hues of the merchandise. Racks and stands display the wares on offer while salesclerks bustle about.

node.name: Pack to Basics, Salesroom
node.description: The shed is a haven for adventure seekers and avid travelers, adorned with an array of rugged, versatile, and stylish containers. Friendly and knowledgeable staff stand ready to assist, helping customers find the perfect container to accompany them on their journeys.

node.name: Floral N Hardy, Sales Tent
node.description: Wildly colorful blossoms run riot over the heavy canvas tent walls while the carved wooden tent poles depict writhing vines. A deep green carpet runs along the floor, its design mimicking that of a plush lawn of grass. A few tables and counters display the merchandise.

node.name: Cause for Locket, Salesroom
node.description: Displays and showcases fill this emporium, each one offering an array of merchandise.

node.name: Hunka's Burning Love
node.description: Placed between tall stained glass windows depicting stylized flames, silversteel braziers illuminate the spacious room. A counter is pushed up against the back wall, while some silver pot hooks and a cast-iron pot rack are suspended from the ceiling to display the merchant's wares.

node.name: The Eye of Power
node.note: the eye of power|eye of power
node.description: Stark white canvas walls painted with crude eye images surround an area bare of anything but the displays of wares. Though swept neatly, even the floor is absent any decoration, leaving patrons to trod the hard packed earth.

node.name: Focus on the Past, Relic Room
node.description: Several soil-stained packing crates stacked along the back encroach towards the interior at random intervals, detracting from the otherwise orderly desk where recent finds are cataloged. Various shelves and bookcases occupy much of the remaining space, holding artifacts marked and tagged from previous expeditions. A slight mustiness lingers in the air, infusing the room with the dampness imagined held within the tomb or temple where these artifacts originated.

node.name: The Other Siegery Shop
node.note: the other siegery shop|other siegery shop
node.description: Elaborate tapestries hang from the four walls in colorful banners. Each is decorated with an army marching over fields and meadows, ready to clash with an opposing army on the opposite banner. Incandescent lights hang from the ceiling, illuminating numerous tables filled with miniature figures and a lone shelf with sets for sale.

node.name: The Other Siegery Shop, Team Gear
node.description: Elaborate tapestries hang from the four walls in colorful banners. Each is decorated with an army marching over fields and meadows, ready to clash with an opposing army on the opposite banner. Incandescent lights hang from the ceiling, illuminating the various sales surfaces.

node.name: Stick and Stable, Salesfloor
node.description: Khaki-colored canvas walls are covered with painted murals of stylized animals running and jumping. Set out on the straw-covered floor are simple wooden racks that showcase the wares on offer. Throughout the space, a faint scent of freshly sawn wood mixes with the dried grass smell from stalks strewn on the floor.

node.name: The Musiceum, Orchestral Manoeuvres
node.description: Dark sable velvet drapery has been hung from ceiling to wall, swathing the room in near blackness. The darkness is staved off completely by several gaethzen globes hung by near invisible wire that have been carefully positioned over the display cases to allow the wares for sale to be seen clearly. Nestled between the swathes of cloth, cases and instrument tools have been hung on pegboards to show them off to their best advantage.

node.name: The Musiceum, Amber Room
node.description: Set up in an octagonal shape, this room has been fitted with amber panels throughout. Behind each panel, light has been set up to allow the amber to glow like a warm fire as well as highlighting the tiny bubbles and animals trapped within. Ornate gold hardware secures each panel to the next, blending almost seamlessly with the tawny-hue of the paneling. Three gaethzen globes suspend above the empty room, while a large hanging sign has been strung up to rest immediately below the middle globe.

node.name: Creature's Pet, Main Tent
node.description: Oiled canvas walls encompass the interior, providing protection from the elements for both the customers and the living merchandise. Sturdy cages are scattered throughout the area, each one displaying one of the pets on offer. Shoppers inspect the various animals, while the animals growl, hiss, or screech back as the mood takes them.

node.name: What A Steel!, Shop
node.description: Sturdy displays showcase an array of weapons, from swords to pikes. The space is organized and well-lit, allowing customers to carefully examine each item while knowledgeable staff provide information on functionality and proper usage.

node.name: Looty Booty, Entrance
node.description: Plain birch walls circumscribe the room, lacking any embellishment or adornment. A square doorway leads further into the shop, while a simple chain dangling from the ceiling holds a gaethzen sphere that illuminates the sparse alcove.

node.name: Looty Booty, Salesfloor
node.description: Glass-fronted wooden cabinets line the walls, their black velvet-covered shelves displaying the exquisite wares to a well-heeled clientele. The pale woods of the paneling and floor provide a sharp contrast to the plush ebony-hued shelving. Genteel salespeople unobtrusively wait to help the patrons with their selections.

node.name: The Clerks' Collections, Entryway
node.description: A deep blue carpet lines the floor, though ripples in the material show it was hastily thrown down and not properly secured. The bare canvas walls reflect the sounds of shoppers outside. Hallways branch off in opposite directions leading away from the entrance.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Entry
node.description: Decoration is sparse in the entryway. A cramped passage leads northward between stacks of empty crates, whose contents are presumably on display elsewhere.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Nexus
node.description: This chamber is the most spacious in the wagon, providing ample room for a crowd to attend a sermon. A high white marble altar rises majestically in the middle of the room, flanked by tall silver candlesticks which cast a nimbus of warm light across its pale surface. Shallow alcoves surround the chamber, branching off in all directions.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Small Alcove
node.description: This small alcove has been draped in pearlescent white silken tapestries. Several large candles held in delicate white-gold floor sconces bathe the area in a gentle glow, causing the tapestries to shimmer beneath the soft caress of the flickering candlelight.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Small Alcove
node.description: Soft black velvet tapestries drape the walls of this alcove, bathed in the light of a single candle held from an ornate platinum floor sconce.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Small Alcove
node.description: A bizarre mix of gaudiness and subtlety, festive banners adorn one side of this small alcove while plain white cotton tapestries mask the other wall. A simple iron lantern sways from the ceiling, bathing the area in its glow.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Small Alcove
node.description: Deep blue watersilk tapestries cascade down the walls, shimmering in the light of an ornate silver lantern suspended from the ceiling. The play of color and light against the fabric gives the cramped alcove a spurious illusion of spaciousness.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Cramped Loft
node.description: Not a single cobweb mars this small loft, allowing a feeling of comfort to permeate throughout. A single candle rises from a golden floor sconce, casting playfully dancing shadows on the walls.

node.name: Farhana's Island Exquisites, Sales Room
node.description: Arched walls are hung with ivory gauze layered over pale rose silk, softening the light of the room and rippling with every breeze. Tall seagrass baskets filled with honeysuckle blossoms and curls of sandalwood and cinnamon bark are tucked in the corners, lending a light and spicy fragrance to the air. Big cushions covered with raw silk and edged with tiny golden bells are scattered near the merchandise racks, inviting shoppers to linger and choose.

node.name: Sable's, Odd Treasures
node.description: Occasional breezes cause the sheets of canvas forming the walls and ribbons on racks to flutter. A layer of sawdust covers the ground, and pale streams of light radiate from whimsical gaethzen globes set at even intervals around the room, giving everything a cheery glow.

node.name: Jousting Grounds, Lances and Roses Souvenir Shop
node.description: Dolls, ribands and other souvenirs are laid out in neat groups atop the display tables in the shop. Sales clerks work quickly to maintain the order as items are snatched up by prize-hungry spectators attending the competitions.

node.name: Eylhaar's Rest, Dive Bar
node.description: The air in this dingy bar is thick with the acrid scent of spilled ale and the smoky residue of countless pipes. Framed by rows of bottles with unrecognizable labels, a massive, weathered painting of a snarling jackal hangs on the wall behind the bar. Dim lanterns flicker, casting elongated shadows that dance across the uneven stone floor. Seashells and fishing nets haphazardly decorate the walls.

node.name: Bows Know Toes, Salesroom
node.description: Clerks bustle between the many tables and racks, restocking merchandise and answering customer questions. The whitewashed plaster walls hold more shelves stacked with wares.

node.name: Heikea, Food Display
node.description: Nestled in among the various furniture displays visible in the background, this corner of the shop offers refreshments prepared by the resident chef. Tables and chairs provide a place to relax and enjoy one's meal before resuming the shopping excursion.

node.name: Artistry of Flesh
node.description: The room is low and cell-like, an excess of gaethzen orbs hanging from the ceiling filling the small space with a harsh, sterile light. The only piece of furniture is a large reclining chair bearing a range of gadgets both mundane and alien. Samples of flash cover the far wall, the only break from the dull grey wood. A thin young Kaldaran man, presumably the artist, stands rigidly out of the way with a flat expression.

node.name: Artistry of Flesh, Side Room
node.description: Gaethzen orbs hang from the ceiling and fill this small room with harsh white light, illuminating the sterile space and its lack of decorations. A small table pushed up against the back wall is covered in a mound of crumpled papers and mangled trinkets, remnants from an unknown project. Nestled amongst unwanted items is a small catalog.

node.name: Knotty Pirate, Entry
node.description: Plain oak paneling covers the walls with rich, yellow-brown wood while the floors are narrower planks of the same wood. Occupying the central space of the entry are some mannequins, dressed in flamboyant outfits.

node.name: Heikea, Beds
node.description: White painted walls give the shop a clean, bright feeling. Nestled in among the various other furniture displays visible in the background, this corner of the shop features beds available for purchase by the discerning homeowner.

node.name: Tiecoon, Shop
node.description: Cramped and confined, the tiny building barely has room for the table displaying the merchandise. Shoppers jostle each other to inspect the wares while the harried salesclerk struggles to keep up with sales.

node.name: Kimme's Oh Noes!, Sales
node.description: Plain bamboo tent poles hold up the tent roof, the thick fabric blocking all light and weather. Braided reed mats cover the ground while a few racks and stands display the merchandise. Moving silently through the crowds, the salesclerks work to keep the wares restocked.

node.name: Makeshift Killing Supplies Annex, Shop
node.description: Crafted of rough wooden boards cobbled together with rusted nails, this wagon looks as though it's ready to fall apart. Wares are displayed in the center of the room, where they are slightly less likely to be attacked by the termites that infest the mobile shop.

node.name: Soulful Trinkets
node.description: Lamps are placed around the room haphazardly, offering just enough light to clearly view the merchandise for sale here. White cloth covers the dark metal walls in an attempt to further brighten the area. Three racks are strategically placed around the room, their colors signifying the sort of aspects the wares on them represent.

node.name: Sofa So Good, Salesroom
node.description: Spacious in extent, the room is floored with broad oak planking sanded smooth and then lacquered to protect the surface. Vertical oak paneling covers the otherwise undecorated walls. Sofas, divans, and other seating are displayed throughout the store, ready for purchase.

node.name: Skin Art by Jaecinda
node.description: The simple wagon lacks any significant decoration. The walls are bare wood, and large windows provide ample natural lighting while an ink-stained rug, likely once cream colored, covers most of the floor. A lone workspace exists for Jaecinda to do her work.

node.name: Jumping Jack's Sashes, Salesfloor
node.description: Bright blue canvas walls provide some shelter from the elements while the tent poles support hanging racks displaying the merchandise. A few clerks busy themselves with restocking sold inventory.

node.name: The Contented Sole, Salesfloor
node.description: Giant appliqued fish are affixed to the canvas walls, cut from colorful felt and decorated with googly eyes. Paper lanterns shaped like various fish species hang from the tent poles, giving light to the room. Shelves and racks crowd the salesfloor, each one stuffed with a wide selection of footwear.

node.name: Proud as a Peacock, Sales Floor
node.description: The room is a mesmerizing sanctuary of elegance and grace, with vibrant hues and intricate patterns reminiscent of the majestic peacock. Walls adorned in rich turquoise and deep royal blue hues set the tone, while iridescent feather motifs grace the decor. Every item mirrors the splendor of a peacock in full display. Shelves and racks display the merchandise while clerks help the shoppers.

node.name: Reinventing the Wheel, Entry
node.description: The aromas of hay and wood are very strong in the small entryway. Rough cedar planks, comprising the shop's floor, creak beneath the movements of customers. Two small bales of hay have been used to anchor a large wagon wheel on its end across from the entrance.

node.name: Reinventing the Wheel, West Room
node.description: Two circular display boards, painted to resemble wagon wheels, have been mounted upon the walls. Various images of available merchandise have been placed within the spokes of each display.

node.name: Reinventing the Wheel, Alcove
node.description: Resembling a closet more than a room, there is barely enough space for the pine and oak easels that dominate the area. A small lantern has been hung directly over the easels and sheds just enough light for viewing.

node.name: The Lost Tavern
node.description: Dark and gloomy, the atmosphere reflects the abandoned appearance of the area. Four dingy, vine-covered walls hide faded messages, once legible and now covered in dust and unreadable, while unlit torches are attached to the rounded wooden beams that support the tall roof of this forgotten building. Small windows covered with dust and grim line the wall above a vine-covered display case. Scattered around the large room are tables covered with various bottles in a variety of sizes. A small bar stands next to the dilapidated door.

node.name: More Tool You, Vestibule
node.description: A large canvas flap is pulled back to allow ingress and egress for the customers. The plain canvas walls of the tent are undecorated and billow slightly in the breeze. Sawdust has been spread across the ground in an effort to control the damage from the passing crowds.

node.name: More Tool You, Outfitting Supplies
node.description: Racks and shelves stand against the canvas walls, filled with tools and supplies for sale. Sawdust covers the ground, the scent of wood mixing with the slightly musty odor of the area.

node.name: More Tool You, Dyes
node.description: Splashes of paint in a myriad of colors cover the canvas walls while colored bins filled with vials are set about the sawdust-covered floor. A few sales clerks move about, refilling the bins and answering questions from the customers.

node.name: More Tool You, Alchemical Supplies
node.description: Lanterns hang from the tent poles as they shed illumination throughout the area. Tables and shelves display the alchemical tools for sale, with clerks kept busy keeping the items in stock.

node.name: More Tool You, Engineering Supplies
node.description: Metal shavings mix with the sawdust on the ground, while the canvas walls are marred by splotches of oil and grease. Sales clerks bustle about, replenishing the merchandise on the counters and stands.

node.name: More Tool You, Enchanting Supplies
node.description: The scent of the pine shavings scattered on the ground permeates the area, mingling with the faint hint of brimstone and smoke. Wooden shelves and racks stand on the sawdust-covered ground, each surface displaying a range of goods for sale.

node.name: More Tool You, Forging Supplies
node.description: Stenciled on the canvas tent walls are stylized hammers, tongs, and anvils, matching the various tools displayed as merchandise throughout the area. A few sales staff stand ready to answer questions or help with purchases.

node.name: Down on the Farm, Salesroom
node.description: Small pens and paddocks are set up on the floor, each one filled with tiny animals munching on fodder. The space overloads the senses with the sounds and smells of a barnyard as the attendents rush around trying to simultaneously help the customers and care for the pets on offer.

node.name: Don't Miss A Ring, Salesroom
node.note: don't miss a ring|dont miss a ring
node.description: Thick canvas walls hang from the sturdy tent poles while the peaked roof soars overhead. A few counters display the merchandise that glitters under the lantern light.

node.name: Tougher Than Weather, Main Tent
node.description: Murals of storm clouds over various landscapes cover the canvas walls. Bright lanterns overhead illuminate the space, accentuating the vibrant colors and textures of the products on shelves and racks neatly organized throughout. A large counter serves as the focal point, where attentive staff stand ready to assist customers.

node.name: Hidden Treasures
node.description: Paper-covered figures crowd this small but festive shop, spilling over tabletops and hanging from hooks in the rafters. A small counter provides limited purchasing space, behind which a smiling clerk awaits all customers. Paper frills and ribbons flutter with every passing breeze, causing the room's contents to wave with colorful abandon.

Figures covered in colorful paper sway from their positions on hooks in the rafters, their colors more subdued in the evening light. A few carefully watched lanterns enclosed in thick glass cast light into the dark corners, causing distorted shadow performances on the walls as the light dances over the pinatas on display.

node.name: Dress for Success, Salesfloor
node.description: Sturdy walls of cut grey limestone are topped by large wooden beams supporting the roof. A few lanterns hang from the roofbeams, illuminating the spacious room and the mannequins displaying the shop's merchandise.

node.name: Raw Silk, Shopfloor
node.description: Tall stands and racks scattered around the shop exhibit the product while keeping the delicate fabrics off the floor. The bustle of the clerks as they circulate about mingles with the chatter of the patrons to create a constant background noise.

node.name: Stabbaticals, Sales Floor
node.description: Billowy white banners are draped along the walls, framing the wooden pegs and hooks affixed at even intervals around the room. A cluster of tables rests upon a dark blue rug stretched over the polished oak floor. Running along the back wall is an intricate mural of a battlefield strewn with broken weaponry and fallen bodies.

node.name: Bottles of Trouble, Salesroom
node.description: Brightly painted canvas walls encircle the tables displaying the shop's merchandise. A few clerks move among the patrons distributing new stock and answering questions.

node.name: Rizadi's Outfitters, Sales Floor
node.description: Brass lanterns hang in each corner, spreading a warm glow over the well-tended merchandise and handsomely framed provincial maps that dot the varnished honey-pine walls. Rows of pewter, brass and copper hooks hang over the iron-banded oak chest that stands near a curtained alcove. An elaborate globe, inlaid with precious gemstones, rests on the centrally located polished walnut counter.

node.name: Who Clothes There?, Sales
node.description: Thick beams overhead support the white plastered ceiling that matches the surrounding walls. Shelves line the walls while tables and racks display the clothing offered for sale. A few salesclerks move about taking care of customers and replacing sold merchandise.

node.name: Just Wanna Have Sun, Main Room
node.description: Cheerful yellow canvas walls are held up by orange-painted tent poles. A myriad of lanterns help illuminate the interior and shine down on the tables and counters displaying the shop's wares. Bright canary-yellow carpets cover the wooden plank floors and provide cushioning for the customer's feet as they peruse the merchandise.

node.name: Less Is Mortar, Showroom
node.description: The whitewashed brick walls support the exposed roofbeams overhead. Dangling from the beams are long chains displaying gaethzen spheres that illuminate the various wall choices on display.

node.name: Basimah's, Sales Room
node.description: Heavy leather harness bells on ropes of braided, brightly-colored cotton are stretched across the room. Thick sheepskins lie before the various merchandise to provide patrons with modest comfort against the cold ground. Etched copper lanterns, set high on the tentpoles, fill the room with the scent of jasmine oil.

node.name: Basimah's, Alcove
node.description: Long rows of candles in ornate brass and copper stands are set on long tables lining the walls. The room is businesslike and unadorned, leaving customers to focus on the selection of merchandise displayed.

node.name: Cup It!, Main Room
node.description: Wide windows are set within latice-work walls that allow the ocean breezes into the structure. Overhead, palm fronds provide the roof which is upheld by sturdy beams. A few shelves and racks display the merchandise while a bustling clerk keeps them supplied.

node.name: Cup It!, Side Room
node.description: A cooling breeze flows through this room which has latice-work walls holding up a frond-covered roof. Windows allow for light to illuminate the tables and stands which display the wares for sale.

node.name: If You Beard It, Outlet
node.description: Whitewashed plaster walls encircle the pale pine planks of the floor on which a few small rugs are scattered. Set against the walls are a number of racks and shelves that display merchandise. Clerks circulate amongst the shoppers, refilling depleted wares and answering questions.

node.name: Eye Spy
node.description: Little more than a closet, this tiny room is lit by what can only charitably called a chandelier -- a simple chain hanging from the ceiling supporting a dirty and chipped lantern. Two large and bizarre clusters of mannequin heads display spectacles for sale.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Vestibule
node.description: Crystals encrusted on the walls glitter in the warm glow of the candelabra resting on the white harpsichord positioned in the center of the room. Next to the instrument is a mannequin dressed in a dazzlingly white ensemble. A pure white wool rug, its plush pile thick and luxurious, covers the ground.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Clothing
node.description: Pink painted walls enclose a wooden floor stained purple. A bright blue table stands in the middle of the room, displaying various clothing items for sale, with an orange and purple painted chest next to it.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Containers
node.description: Fake leopard-print wallpaper covers the walls, clashing with the zebra-skin rugs on the black and white checked wooden floor. A counter, covered with red dyed fur, holds containers for sale.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Pointy Things
node.description: Plum-colored watered silk covers the upper walls over a wainscotting of cherrywood. Matching planks form the floor which peeks out beneath the numerous sheepskins scattered about as carpets. Wildly painted weapon stands and armor racks display the wares for sale.

node.name: Bar Homebug, Salesroom
node.description: Plain pine walls enclose the spacious sales area. High up on the ceiling are a number of gaezthen spheres that illuminate the merchandise on display.

node.name: Chuffed To Be Stuffed, Large Workshop
node.description: Tone-on-tone white brocade has broken up at intervals with large clear cylinders that rise from oak floor to tent ceiling. Within each cylinder, a cloud of colored cotton resides, making a veritable rainbow within this large room. In between each cylinder are shelving units holding a variety of stuffed creatures or other objects. A large wine barrel has been placed in one corner of the room.

node.name: The Photash School of Butlery, Offsite Services
node.note: the photash school of butlery|photash school of butlery
node.description: Richly colored, elaborate rugs cover the bulk of the wodden floors, and the few spots that remain visible are located in corners and other obscure areas. Well-dressed clerks stand at the ready to assist patrons as they inspect and question each of the butlers whose services are being marketed. A light scent of cinnamon lingers throughout the shop.

node.name: Craftsmen's Academy, A Private Forging Room
node.description: Thick walls struggle to contain the blistering heat of the workshop where the fires blaze endlessly night and day. The flickering flames give a reddish glow to the racks and shelves of tools and equipment, all neatly placed and ready for use. Workers enter in their protective gear from time to time, checking the equipment and reporting back to a sentry at the entry.

node.name: Tomes of Lore
node.description: The bookstore features stone walls adorned with faded tapestries woven with scenes of historic battles. Heavy, wooden furniture, including ornate reading desks and oak bookshelves, dominates the space. Valuable books, some leather-bound with gold leaf lettering, line the shelves. A faint, musty scent pervades the shop, whose ambience is further enhanced by the soft glow of gaethzen.

node.name: Farm in Arms, Salesfloor
node.description: Painted to resemble wide planks, the bright red walls billow softly in the breeze. Thick tent poles hold up the tent's roof, each beam a single beam of rough-cut pine. A few lanterns hang from the tent poles and provide illumination.

node.name: Craftsmen's Academy, A Private Alchemy Room
node.description: A large workbench dominates one side of the room with numerous pieces of alchemical equipment scattered haphazardly upon its surface. The high, vented windows provide relief from the common, yet unpleasant, smell that permeates the room.

node.name: Andreshlew, Lehojen Mitauli Meclagadau
node.description: The sounds of the festivities taking place outside are subdued and distorted here as they echo repeatedly off the cavernous stone walls. A sloping tunnel descends further underground before curving back upwards. From this vantage point, whatever lies at the end of the tunnel seems well lit as shadows are cast towards the inflection point. A faint, sweet, and earthy scent lingers in the air.

node.name: Andreshlew, Lehojen Mitauli Meclagadau
node.description: Suspended from the ceiling high above are brilliantly illuminated globes, each a different color ranging from cool blues and royal purples to fiery reds and sunny yellows. Merelew clad in armor pass through from time to time, moving further into the opening chamber and are frequently escorted by frantic visitors or fellow Merelew. A heavy pollen scent fills the air.

node.name: Andreshlew, Lehojen Mitauli Meclagadau
node.description: Shovels, picks, and other gardening tools are scattered haphazardly from toppled crates. Every pair of pruning shears seems to have been soundly broken or disassembled, their pieces tossed wildly about with some blades even lodged into the walls. A heavy layer of pollen coats everything with colorful, glitter-like dust. The overhead lighting casts ominous shadows, as if beasts were crawling amongst the illuminating orbs above.

node.name: Andreshlew, Lehojen Mitauli Meclagadau
node.description: Storage holes, slots, shelves and more are carved into the cavern's walls and stalagmites that rise up from the smoothed stone floor -- all packed full of neatly tied bundles of dried or drying herbs and medicinal plants. Rows upon rows of cambrinth-capped Wayerd pyramids and mixing jars are lined up, though many have been toppled, smashed and substantially damaged.

node.name: Andreshlew, Lehojen Mitauli Meclagadau
node.description: Small puddles of water have formed throughout the area as the humidity forms condensation that drips from the walls and ceiling. Some clever stonework successfully redirects much of the water into recessed, well-like structures carved into the walls. Raised stone planters that once held plants, saplings and other specimens have been knocked from their pedestals, scattering soil -- now mud -- and dying plants alike.

node.name: Craftsmen's Academy, A Private Outfitting Room
node.description: A pure-white wainscoted hall is topped by lilac-hued paisley painted walls. Occupying the back third of the room is a solid-looking loom, while a large spinning wheel sits near the entrance. Resting atop a deep purple rug is a sturdy worktable and a comfortable, wicker chair. Running parallel along opposing walls are several hooks and shelves, holding practically every conceivable tool, spool of thread, bobbin, thimble and scrap.

node.name: Craftsmen's Academy, A Private Enchanting Room
node.description: Pieced together by a seemingly blind worker, the walls are covered with scraps of rugs, blankets, and carpets in a kaleidoscope of colors. A burly, light pink feldspar table is stashed in a corner of the room, providing plenty of room to work.

node.name: Fussbudget Furnishings, Chamber of Spirits
node.description: Warm magenta light suffuses the room, cast by a tinted gaethzen lantern suspended above. An eclectic collection of furniture pieces and building supply samples sits on display in the pinkish glow, attended by smiling clerks.

node.name: Idon Abide the Ten, Vestments
node.description: Overlapping panels of bluefire velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a black-swirled gloamstone monument of Hodierna and Damaris.

node.name: Idon Abide the Ten, Iconography
node.description: Overlapping panels of bluefire velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a black-swirled gloamstone monument of Hodierna and Damaris.

node.name: A Cultured Attire, The Forest Elves
node.description: An elaborate tapestry of a dense forest fills the back wall of the pavilion, and the faint glow of the Sana'ati Dyaus can be seen peeking past the thick trunks of trees. Willowy clerks glide from room to room, graceful despite the piles of clothing, weapons and armor that they carry.

node.name: A Cultured Attire, The Sand Elves
node.description: Shimmering dark blue silk hangs in graceful swags along the wall, catching the light as it ripples. Plush cushions scattered here and there upon the layered carpets provide a place to rest or sip some tea while shopping.

node.name: A Cultured Attire, The Wind Elves
node.description: A mural of a rolling plain abundant with spring flowers and a herd of stallions covers three walls as a backdrop to a pair of mannequins placed between a basket and table. Willowy clerks glide from room to room, graceful despite the piles of clothing, weapons and armor that they carry.

node.name: A Cultured Attire, The River Elves
node.description: Rippling lengths of blue-green watersilk hang from the walls, lightly tinged with silver threads embroidered here and there, giving the room the feel of a bubble of air amidst the depths of the ocean. Willowy clerks glide from room to room, graceful despite the piles of clothing, weapons and armor that they carry.

node.name: A Cultured Attire, The Snow Elves
node.description: Attached to the walls, large swathes of fluffy wool have been secured and accented by touches of blue and grey to give the room the feeling of being surrounded by snowdrifts. Detailed small perspective landscapes have been painted on the wooden walls, displaying images of hunts with polar bears, ice wyrms and other fierce creatures.

node.name: A Cultured Attire, The Celestial Elves
node.description: Rippling lengths of silvery-blue watersilk hang from the walls, lightly tinged with gold threads embroidered here and there, giving the room an airy feel. Willowy clerks glide from room to room, graceful despite the piles of clothing, weapons and armor that they carry.

node.name: Gearanimals, Main Room
node.description: Scattered across the floor is a light layer of metallic dust in a variety of shades. Trails of cleaner ground snake through the debris, forming intricate patterns in the dust. Nothing else decorates the bare plaster walls or floor.

node.name: The Eclectic Eccentric, Furniture
node.description: This room is heavily draped from ceiling to floor with plush black cloth. Here and there tiny rhinestones twinkle in the light of a faceted gaezthen globe hanging from the ceiling, suggesting a night sky. Small paw or hand prints atop the globe seem to have come from a creature of some sort, currently absent.

node.name: The Eclectic Eccentric, Housing
node.description: A trio of graceful mannequins are poised in an airy dance. One has arms outstretched and face turned upward like a tree worshiping the sun. Another is swept over sideways in a dramatic arc, gauzy tunic stenciled with green lines like grasses waving on a windswept knoll. The third balances between them, knee bent in a pirouette and hands raised to shape a house's roof overhead.

node.name: Beard in Action, Showroom
node.description: Thick logs, still covered with bark, form the stout walls while overhead exposed beams hold up the roof. A few lanterns hanging down from the beams emit a fitful light. A few shelves display the wares on offer.

node.name: Aerial Artistry, Paint It On
node.description: A rainbow of colors appears to be splashed across the walls, each section displaying drip marks and bits of splatter from the bordering sections. Four platforms in red, yellow, green and blue are evenly spaced around the room, holding small jars, vials and boxes.

node.name: Aerial Artistry, Aerial At Home
node.description: In all different hues, panels of silk are draped from a single point on the ceiling, while lights are placed behind them to give the area a soft, colorful glow.

node.name: Aerial Artistry, Featureless
node.description: Masks of all shapes and sizes cover the walls, appearing to show no order to their placement. They create a riot of colors and expressions around the area. Painted stands are placed carefully along the edges of the area.

node.name: Jewelry in Phases
node.description: Crystal representations of Elanthia's moons hang from the dark velvet ceiling of the room, illuminated from within by burning oil lamps. Silvery globes representing stars join them in celestial harmony, reflecting the multihued light over the glittering wares below.

node.name: Greetings For Sale, Front of the Shack
node.description: Vertical planks of wood support a slanting roof that shows a few gaps plugged by rags and paper. One corner boasts a small counter behind which a surly clerk leans against a wall. Shelves and racks of cards fill the rest of the space inside the confined shop.

node.name: High on the Frog, Entrance
node.description: Set in the corners are four polished brass braziers that illuminate the entryway with flickering flames. Canvas walls wave slightly in the breeze, the pale blue bands at their bottom swaying much like the waves on the ocean. Wood shavings are spread on the ground, the faint pine scent mixing with the faint smoky smell from the braziers.

node.name: All The King's Men, Vests
node.note: all the king's men}all the kings men
node.description: Gossamer ruby silk draperies divide this sales floor from the remainder of the tent. Thick wool rugs dyed in stylized flame motifs are spread on the dark plank floors. Flamewood tables and racks set about on the carpets hold neat piles of merchandise.

node.name: All The King's Men, Belts
node.description: Golden silk draperies, delicate as gossamer, section off this sales floor from the rest of the tent. Thick wool rugs, adorned with stylized sunburst patterns, are laid across the pale yellow wooden floors. Satinwood tables and racks are arranged on the carpets, displaying neatly stacked merchandise.

node.name: The Finer Things, Front Room
node.description: The room is lavishly floored with durian buffed to a brilliant sheen while a perfume bottle chandelier hangs from above illuminating the opulent coral walls with a warm glow. A shelf of brushed platinum faces an intricately carved chest, each carefully placed to subtly catch the light upon their showcased wares. Taking the central focal point of the room is a glass counter wrapped in strands of seashells and adorned with purposely placed jars of brightly glowing gaethzen.

node.name: The Gear Shop, The Inventive Gentleman
node.description: Painted across the canvas panels with an inexpert hand are scenes of young male Gnomes exploring a bright green and tangled jungle. One stands proudly atop a fallen log, his right hand shielding his eyes as his left hand stretches toward some distant spectacle. A plush rug of dirt-brown speckled with grass-green shades covers the floor from edge to edge. Low shelves stand next to the walls, presenting a danger of banged knees to the taller races.

node.name: Sable's, Masquerade
node.description: Fabric walls in subdued shades serve as the backdrop for displays of colorful masks in many varieties. Bright feathers, gems, and cord adorn the masks that liberally cover the table and hang from the three racks on the walls.

node.name: Heikea, Chairs
node.description: White painted walls give the shop a clean, bright feeling. Nestled in among the various other furniture displays visible in the background, this corner of the shop features chairs available for purchase by the discerning homeowner.

node.name: Heikea, Tables
node.description: White painted walls give the shop a clean, bright feeling. Nestled in among the various other furniture displays visible in the background, this corner of the shop features tables available for purchase by the discerning homeowner.

node.name: Comedy of Letters, Sales Floor
node.description: Simple whitewashed walls are covered with shelves and racks displaying the shop's wares. Overhead the oil lanterns illuminate the shop with clear light while the clerks move about restocking merchandise.

node.name: Tieheq With the Thirteen, Vestibule
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Ritual Addiction, Ceremony
node.description: Smooth leather walls of overlaid straps with silver studs rise up around a dark haon floor. Dim sconces cast irregular shadows across the room, revealing a collection of deliberately arranged tables.

node.name: Ritual Addiction, Theory
node.description: Smooth leather walls of overlaid straps with silver studs rise up around a dark haon floor. Dim sconces cast irregular shadows across the room, revealing a collection of deliberately arranged tables.

node.name: Ritual Addiction, Strife
node.description: Smooth leather walls of overlaid straps with silver studs rise up around a dark haon floor. Dim sconces cast irregular shadows across the room, revealing a collection of deliberately arranged tables.

node.name: In The Hair Tonight, Sales
node.description: Small shelves and racks line the stone walls, each one displaying some of the shop's merchandise. A couple of clerks circulate around the room as they replace sold items and answer customer questions.

node.name: Cry Me A Quiver, Shop
node.description: Thick stone walls enclose the area, providing lots of space to hang shelves, racks, and other displays. Salesclerks move about sedately, helping customers and restocking sold merchandise.

node.name: High on the Frog, Front Room
node.description: All along the canvas walls are a series of stylized frogs painted in shades of green and brown. A few are hopping while others are sitting or attempting to capture flying insects. Overhead a series of brass lanterns illuminate the shop's merchandise.

node.name: High on the Frog, Side Chamber
node.description: Stenciled onto the center of each canvas panel is a bulging-eyed frog staring straight out into the room. Flanking each frog is a stylized lily bloom, done in white paint. A few racks and shelves are scattered about the shaving-covered ground.

node.name: High on the Frog, Side Alcove
node.description: Standing in the center of the room is a human-sized wooden sculpture of a giant frog, its eyes bulging and long tongue hanging out. Painted stands circle the statue, keeping the curious from getting close while simultaneously displaying wares for sale. The ground is covered with pine shavings that add their fresh scent to the faint oil and leather odors of the merchandise.

node.name: The Upper Crust, Kitchen
node.description: A sweet aroma surrounds the area when walking through the tiny bakery door. Glazed donuts, sweet treats, and freshly brewed coffee line the shelves behind a polished brinewood counter. A large brick oven and baker's cabinet sit along the back wall while extensive cooking tools hang from a hook. Near the door, a polished baker's rack, a smooth counter, some hooks, and a stand display a variety of wares.

node.name: Nectar of the Wisp, Main Room
node.description: An abundance of plants and small trees in pots have been placed against all the walls, which are painted like the night sky. Small glowing orbs, in a multitude of colors, have been hung by black strings and appear to float above the merchandise on display.

node.name: Curiosity Kilt the Cat, Main Room
node.description: Colorful stripes run vertically and horizontally across the tent's fabric, creating a colorful plaid design. Clerks help customers make purchases as well as restocking the merchandise on the shelves and racks scattered about the tent.

node.name: Riptide Roasters, Brightwater Blend
node.description: As night falls, the shop takes on a tranquil glow, lit by hanging lanterns shaped like jellyfish. The warm light flickers across the smooth driftwood walls and sparkles off the glassy seashell chandeliers. The gentle hum of waves can be heard through the open windows, while candles on each surfboard table cast long, dancing shadows over the sand-hued floor.

node.name: Riptide Roasters, Nightfall Drip
node.description: The shop buzzes with activity as sunlight pours in through open shutters, casting patterns on the sand-colored tile floor. The scent of coffee mingles with rum and exotic liqueurs from the bottles lining the bamboo shelves behind the bar. Small tables, surrounded by woven rattan chairs, dot the room, while a tropical mural of palms and waves brightens one wall.

node.name: Butterfly Meadow, Garden Room
node.description: The spacious room has walls painted in a soft, verdant green hue similar to that of a lush garden. An intricately designed rug covers the floor, depicting a meadow in full bloom with vibrant wildflowers and fluttering butterflies. Delicate paper lanterns hanging from the ceiling cast a soft, diffused light across the room, casting soft shadows that mimic dappled sunshine filtering through a canopy of leaves. The room is filled with a sweet scent of flowers and fresh earth, creating an immersive experience similar to walking in a serene garden sanctuary. Three shelves line a side wall, while some hooks hang above a small table next to a sturdy coat stand, all displaying clothing for sale. A carved eucalyptus door painted like a giant tree leads out.

node.name: The Finer Things, Back Room
node.description: The opulence of the shop is carried into this room, but with a more casual setting. Sun bleached coral walls are draped in pastel-tinted whisperlayne interwoven with soft glowing lights that help to highlight the salt-stained durian floors. Reclaimed wood and expensive fabrics combine to create the chests and whitewashed shelves used to display the wares in the cozy area.

node.name: The Finer Things, Corner
node.description: The lush, ocean-blue carpeting of the small room serves the dual purposes of muffling the sounds of heavy foot traffic and providing a more cushioned place to sit or stand. Lavish piles of sea-shell patterned pillows are stacked with an eye to detail and the customers' comfort in mind. Potted palm trees strung with softly glowing sungold lanterns stand in each corner of the room, giving off just enough light to create a relaxed ambience.

node.name: The Gear Shop, The Intrepid Adventuress
node.description: Brightly hued paints depict a young female Gnome standing alone on a stretching savanna, small blobs of trees and animals only guessable by their colors. She stands tall, for a Gnome, with high heeled boots and an umbrella perched jauntily over her shoulder while her long hair curls to the side as if caught by a wind. Sandy hued, a rug covers the floor and allows the many short tables a place to rest.

node.name: Tieheq With the Thirteen, Accouterments
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Tieheq With the Thirteen, Iconography
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Tieheq With the Thirteen, Vestments
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Exit
node.description: It's the ocean!

node.name: The Gallaenia, Postal Office
node.description: Tucked away in a compartment is a wooden counter. Spread across the compartment walls is a sweeping mural of a noontide sky over a whitecapped ocean. Vast, countless rows of differently sized shelves are behind the counter, and complex Dwarven mechanisms can be heard as they rearrange the package-covered storage. Clerks shuffle endlessly back and forth between the counters and shelving as they assist patrons with their packaging and mailing needs.

node.name: The Clerks' Collections, Entrances
node.description: A deep blue carpet lines the floors, though ripples in the material show it was hastily thrown down and not properly secured. Strips of matching material line the walls at regular intervals to mute some of the echoing sounds, and gaethzen lanterns occupy every other gap to light the corridor. Leaning in the remaining open spaces are replicas of a number of doorways, arches, and other entrances of various styles.

node.name: The Clerks' Collections, Additional Surfaces
node.description: A deep blue carpet lines the floor, though ripples in the material show it was hastily thrown down and not properly secured. Sheets of gleaming metal conceal most of the spider's construction, though the steam pipes overhead remain exposed. The items scattered around would ordinarily seem to belong to a storage room, but most have price tags attached indicating inventory waiting to be sold.

node.name: The Clerks' Collections, Backroom Access
node.description: A deep blue carpet lines the floors, though ripples in the material show it was hastily thrown down and not properly secured. Strips of matching material line the walls at regular intervals to mute some of the echoing sounds, and gaethzen lanterns occupy every other gap to light the small chamber. Leaned in the remaining open spaces are replicas of a number of doorways, arches and other entrances of various styles.

node.name: The Clerks' Collections, Wall Panels
node.description: The floor and ceiling of the circular chamber are bare, the canvas rippling slightly occasionally. A single gaethzen lantern hangs from the tent poles overhead. Curiously, the tent walls are covered in a hodgepodge of panels depicting segments of otherwise typical walls consisting of wood, colored papers, and more.

node.name: The Clerks' Collections, Surfaces Aplenty
node.description: A deep blue carpet lines the floors, though ripples in the material show it was hastily thrown down and not properly secured. Pale light from a back corner illuminates the space, though it's rather weak in the corners opposite from it. A number of tables, counters, pedestals and other flat surfaces fill the large chamber's floorspace while racks, shelves and hooks hang from the walls.

node.name: The Clerks' Collections, Flooring
node.description: The floor and walls are plain canvas in this chamber. A single gaethzen lantern hangs from the exposed tent pipes overhead, illuminating a number of upright panels that would look better laid flat as flooring.

node.name: The Clerks' Collections, Miscellany
node.description: A deep blue carpet lines the floor, though ripples in the material show it was hastily thrown down and not properly secured. The walls of plain canvas hide the crowds outside and the supporting tent poles hold up the roof. The items scattered around would ordinarily seem to belong to a storage room, but most have price tags attached indicating inventory waiting to be sold.

node.name: Farhana's Island Exquistites, Back Room
node.description: Arched openings in the walls are hung with airy aqua gauze layered over light green silk, adding a blue tint to the room and rippling in the sea breezes. A few potted flowers are scattered about, adding a splash of color and scenting the air with floral fragrances. A few mannequins act as displays for outfits while hooks hold the merchandise.

node.name: Limited Trejures, Caravan Interior
node.description: Rickety racks and shelves line the cramped interior which is lit by a couple of oil lanterns placed haphazardly about. A slight musty scent pervades the area while the small windows are so grime-covered as to be opaque.
